sense.gloss: ups and downs (e.g. in life), vicissitudes
stormy and full of drama, many drastic events in the course of events, full of ups and downs, with many vicissitudes
maelstrom, the state of affairs being in great turmoil
very involved and troublesome situation, complicated twists and turns

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓の↑一生↑↓いっしょう↓は↑波瀾万丈↑↓はらんばんじょう↓であった。
sdata.e: His life was full of ups and downs.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓の↑人生↑↓じんせい↓は↑波瀾万丈↑↓はらんばんじょう↓だね。
sdata.e: His life is full of ups and downs.

words.gloss: stormy and full of drama, many drastic events in the course of events, full of ups and downs, with many vicissitudes
